title: Means-cum-Merit Scholarship for fiancial Aid
content: A scholarship is an award of financial aid for a student to further their education at a private elementary or secondary school, or a private or public

title: National Scholarship
content: A scholarship is an award of financial aid for a student to further their education at a private elementary or secondary school, or a private or public

title: Google Internship
content: A scholarship is an award of financial aid for a student to further their education at a private elementary or secondary school, or a private or public

title: Google Step Internship
content: A scholarship is an award of financial aid for a student to further their education at a private elementary or secondary school, or a private or public

title: MicroSoft Internship
content: A scholarship is an award of financial aid for a student to further their education at a private elementary or secondary school, or a private or public

title: National Fellowship
content: A scholarship is an award of financial aid for a student to further their education at a private elementary or secondary school, or a private or public

title: PG Fellowship
content: A scholarship is an award of financial aid for a student to further their education at a private elementary or secondary school, or a private or public

title: National2 Scholarship
content: A scholarship is an award of financial aid for a student to further their education at a private elementary or secondary school, or a private or public

title: Young Women in STEM Scholarship
content: This scholarship will support three female, low-income high school seniors or undergraduate students majoring in STEM.

title: Connie Konatsotis Scholarship
content: This scholarship seeks to honor Connie's legacy and passion for education by supporting two female students who plan to pursue degrees in STEAM.

title: Newsette No-Essay Leadership Scholarship for Women
content: This scholarship is perfect for anyone interested in fashion, beauty, tech, and business news, alongside advice and insight from inspirational women.

title: Elevate Girl's Wrestling Scholarship
content: This scholarship seeks to empower girls and encourage them to continue breaking barriers in wrestling and in society in general.

title: Vanessa Muza Teskey Memorial Scholarship
content: This scholarship seeks to help one female student who is an aspiring writer or journalist pursue her education and make a difference in the world.

title: Learner Education Women in Mathematics Scholarship
content: This scholarship will support one woman inmath who has large ambitions for her career and the impact she can have in the world of math and tech.

title: Fight for Equality Women in STEM Scholarship
content: The Fight for Equality  Women in STEM Scholarship is meant to support and encourage young women to pursue a degree in STEM.  $500 award will help female high school students pay their college tuition.

title: Future Female Educators Scholarship
content: This scholarship seeks to ensure that students who want to become teachers have the necessary funding to do so by supporting female-identifying students who are studying education

title: Elevate Women in Technology Scholarship
content: The Elevate Women in Technology Scholarship exists to move the tech industry in the right direction by empowering the next generation of extraordinary women leaders.

title: 3Wishes Women's Empowerment Scholarship
content: This scholarship aims to support women and address the many hardships women still face in the world, such as discrimination, income inequality, and abuse. To apply, write a short essay about what society needs to do to empower women.

title: Hispanic Women in Wildlife Conservation Scholarship
content: This scholarship aims to support students who are passionate about caring for the environment and wildlife so that our endangered species and climate can be protected for future generations.

title: Lillian's & Ruby's Way Scholarship
content: This scholarship will support one woman between the ages of 18 and 30 on their educational journey.

title: AICTE  SWANATH SCHOLARSHIP SCHEME
content: AICTE has approved 'AICTE  SWANATH SCHOLARSHIP SCHEME' for children from any one of the following categories:

title: AICTE - YOUTH UNDERTAKING VISIT FOR ACQUIRING KNOWLEDGE (YUVAK)
content: AICTE Scheme for study tour of ATAL TUNNEL, Himachal Pradesh YOUTH UNDERTAKING VISIT FOR ACQUIRING KNOWLEDGE (YUVAK)

title: AICTE LILAVATI AWARD
content: AICTE intends to seek applications for AICTEs LILAVATI AWARD-2020 based on the theme Women Empowerment from the eligible teams of AICTE approved institutions, who have undertaken remarkable intervention for the cause and made an impact that showcases their work under six different sub- themes.

title: PG Scholarship
content: Scholarship is awarded to full time GATE/GPAT qualified students admitted to M.E./ M. Tech/ M. Arch and M.Pharma courses in AICTE approved Institutions/Colleges @Rs. 12,400/- PM/ student.

title: AICTE Doctoral Fellowship (ADF)
content: Admitting full time meritorious research scholars by providing research fellowship who wants to seek admission to Ph.D. in AICTE approved Technical Institutes/University Departments for carrying out research in thrust areas

title: Pragati Scholarship
content: Scholarship/Contingency is awarded to meritorious girls taking admission in AICTE approved Technical institution at Degree/ Diploma. Total 10000 scholarship are given @ Rs 50000 as incidentals each year.

title: Saksham Scholarship
content: Scholarship/Contingency is awarded  to  Differently  abled students taking admission in AICTE approved Technical institution at Degree/ Diploma. Scholarship given @ Rs 50000 as incidentals each year.

title: Support to Students for Participating in Competition Abroad (SSPCA)
content: The objective of the scheme is to provide travel assistance registration fees to a team of minimum 2 to 10 students for attending competition at international level in order to encourage engineering students to improve their field of technical education.

title: Prime Minister’s Special Scholarship Scheme  PMSSS
content: Objective of the Scheme is to build up capacities in youth of J&K, educate, enable and empowering them to compete in normal course, enhancing and boosting employment potentials in students of J&K. Total 5000 scholarship are given @ Rs. 100000/- as Maintenance Charges and academic fee as Rs. 30000/- to General Degree, Rs. 125000/- to Engineering Degree & Rs. 300000/- to Medical Degree each year.

title: AICTE-INAE TRAVEL GRANT SCHEME
content: An AICTE-INAE Travel Grant Scheme for Engineering Students to present papers abroad has been launched for enhancing the quality of engineering education in the country.

title: Smart India Hackathon 2019
content: A unique initiative to identify new and disruptive digital solutions for solving the challenges faced by our country under the program of Smart India Hackathon 2017. This event was held on 1st  2nd April 2017 for 36 hrs non-stop competition. 9544 technology students, 598 problems statements, 29 different central govt. ministries, 26 different Nodal centres & funding of Rs. 3 Lakh per team for 100 qualified teams.

title: M.Tech Projects as Internship with Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs)
content: The main objective of the scheme is to nurture an innovation ecosystem that benefits the technologically deficient MSMEs and technical institutes both. 408 Small and Medium Enterprises have given requirement of 738 Technology students.

title: Research Publication Grant in STEM
content: They are open to women scholars conducting basic research in engineering, medicine or the physical or biological sciences and who have a doctorate degree in one of those fields. The grantee must publish their research in a scholarly publication and be listed as a primary author.

title: SERB - POWER Research Grants
content: This scheme aims to encourage emerging and eminent women researchers for individual-centric and competitive mode of research funding to undertake R&D activities in frontier areas of science and engineering. POWER Grants will empower women researchers by funding them under following two categories- Level I- The scale of funding upto 60 Lakhs for three years. Level II: The scale of funding upto 30 Lakhs for three years

title: National Research Fellowship
content: A scholarship is an award of financial aid for a student to further their education at a private elementary or secondary school, or a private or public

title: Women Overseas Fellowship
content: Indian women applicant having Ph.D. degree in Basic Sciences, Engineering or Technology including Agricultural and Medical Sciences and holding a regular position at any recognized academic institution/ R&D institute/ university/ college in India.

title: STEM Summer Scholars Institute (SSI)
content: The Summer Scholars Institute, an eight-week program held at the IU Bloomington and IUPUI campuses, enrolls select students from IU and partner Minority Serving Institutions (MSIs). These STEM Scholars engage in continuous, substantive research at the Summer Scholars Institute and their universities.

title: SERB - POWER Fellowship
content: This Fellowship will identify and reward outstanding women researchers and innovators working in Indian academic institutions and R&D laboratories, holding Ph.D.degree in any branch of science and engineering.
